TITLE: Episode 10 - Why Can't We Be Friends?
DESCRIPTION: It’s been a while, but now they’re back! Jessie and Maddie discuss the challenges of being friends with those of differing political opinions. They discuss the do’s and don’ts of how to keep it sane, keep it peaceful and keep it voluntary.
